channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-6817] [WINDOWS] Get HBase tests working under Windows
item.description: This is an umbrella jira for getting HBase unit tests working under windows. We can link to individual test fixes, and track the general progress here.
item.summary: [WINDOWS] Get HBase tests working under Windows

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Attaching tests results from a fresh checkout for 0.94 and trunk without any windows-specific patches in.

The summary for 0.94 is:


small:

Tests run: 567, Failures: 0, Errors: 3, Skipped: 0

medium:

Tests run: 651, Failures: 3, Errors: 24, Skipped: 2

large:

Tests run: 295, Failures: 1, Errors: 31, Skipped: 9

For trunk, summary for the small/medium/large tests from hbase-server are below. hbase-common and other modules' tests run fine.


Tests run: 586, Failures: 1, Errors: 3, Skipped: 0



Tests run: 698, Failures: 12, Errors: 20, Skipped: 2



Tests run: 369, Failures: 6, Errors: 45, Skipped: 9

Here are the failing tests:


Running org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred.TestTableMapReduce
